html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05052024-05-09PS, CBSA
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2021, No.1
Budget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1
SubjectOrder Amending the Order Fixing May 13, 2024 as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2021, No. 1 and the Budget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1 Come into Force
PrecisOrder amending the Order fixing May 13, 2024 as the day on which certain provisions of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, No. 1 and the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, No. 1 COME INTO FORCE in order to delay the coming into force day from May 13 to October 21, 2024.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2024-0021 Publication Date: 2024-05-22
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending the Order fixing May 13, 2024 as the day on which certain provisions of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2021, No. 1 and the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, No. 1 COME INTO FORCE in order to delay the coming into force day from May 13 to October 21, 2024.
